summary: Federal Prison Industries is a government-owned corporation that seeks to provide marketable job skills to inmates. It sells inmate-produced goods and services, mostly to federal agencies. A new law in 2018 began to allow these goods/services to be sold to nonprofits and the District of Columbia as well. The goal of this program is to help inmates in their reentry into society. However, we found...
title: Federal Prison Industries: Actions Needed to Evaluate Program Effectiveness
